languages.text: "Может быть. Но мне хотелось бы знать точно. Если вдруг он или она не появятся — мы рискуем так никогда и не узнать, кому же Денз хотел оставить наследство".
"Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."
languages.original_text: "Может быть. Но мне хотелось бы знать точно. Если вдруг он или она не появятся — мы рискуем так никогда и не узнать, кому же Денз хотел оставить наследство".

traits.locale_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out to whom Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune."
"Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out to whom Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune."
"Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."
"Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."
"Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

languages.text: “或许会吧，但我希望能得到个确切的答案。如果那个人不露面，恐怕我们永远都弄不清楚丹兹究竟想把他的遗产赠给谁。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

traits.locale_text: “或许会吧，但我希望能得到个确切的答案。如果那个人不露面，恐怕我们永远都弄不清楚丹兹究竟想把他的遗产赠给谁。”

languages.text: «Tal vez, pero me gustaría asegurarme. Si no aparece, tal vez nunca sepamos a quién quería legar su fortuna Denz».
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez, pero me gustaría asegurarme. Si no aparece, tal vez nunca sepamos a quién quería legar su fortuna Denz».

languages.text: 「その可能性はありますね。しかし、私ははっきりと知りたいのです。もし姿を現さなければ、デンツが誰に遺産を残そうとしていたのか一生知ることがないかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

traits.locale_text: 「その可能性はありますね。しかし、私ははっきりと知りたいのです。もし姿を現さなければ、デンツが誰に遺産を残そうとしていたのか一生知ることがないかもしれません」

languages.text: "Ja, vielleicht. Aber ich wüsste es gerne mit Sicherheit. Denn falls nicht, finden wir möglicherweise niemals heraus, wem Denz sein Vermögen vermachen wollte."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, vielleicht. Aber ich wüsste es gerne mit Sicherheit. Denn falls nicht, finden wir möglicherweise niemals heraus, wem Denz sein Vermögen vermachen wollte."

languages.text: « Peut-être, oui, mais il faudrait en être absolument certains. Si il ou elle ne se manifeste pas, nous ne saurons peut-être jamais à qui Denz voulait léguer sa fortune. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être, oui, mais il faudrait en être absolument certains. Si il ou elle ne se manifeste pas, nous ne saurons peut-être jamais à qui Denz voulait léguer sa fortune. »

languages.text: "Belki ama emin olmak istiyorum. Kendisini göstermezse Denz'in servetini bırakmak istediği şahıs aslında kim, hiç öğrenemeyebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. But I would like to know for certain. If they don't make an appearance, we might never find out who Denz wanted to bequeath his fortune to."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de ama emin olmak istiyorum. Kendisini göstermezse Denz'in servetini kime miras bırakmak istediğini asla öğrenemeyebiliriz."
